products.name: high-back bench
products.content:
*All colors feature some degree of heathering: meaning two or more colors/variations of yarn are knitted together, the effect is more pronounced in the grey because, however there are slight variations in the ambrosia, rose, and olympian blue.
Wash and Dry on delicate cycle with like colors, Hang or Line Dry recommended - tumble dry low heat. Light Iron ok (avoid lace and drawstring)
body: 87% polyester, 10% rayon, 3% spandex (lace trim nylon/spandex)
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection

products.name: albany table
products.content:
Morning chill, surprise knock on the door, or long weekend away - find your perfect go-to robe in our new range, Matchplay. In the most heavenly soft jersey knit, this will be the first thing you put on in the morning and when you get home in the evening.
Fall in love with little details like the wide attached tie, the figure flattering a-line shape, or the long cozy sleeves that push and stay up when they need to. There's nothing more luxurious than wrapping yourself up in slinky jersey full-length robe, instantly transporting you to a luxurious spa or hotel. This could be love, or just a match made in lounge heaven.
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection

products.name: ccent chair
products.content:
100% silk and hand dyed/hand cut & appliquï¿½d lace
Matte charmeuse outer, satin finish against skin
Silk satin binding at back opening, along neck/front
Delicate french seams and baby hem
Inverted box pleat with satin outer in contrast with matte body (for those meaningful exits)
Double tie with side slit and outer loop allow for easy adjustable fit/sizing
Dry clean

products.name: wooden table
products.content:
All colors display some degree of heathering from multiple yarns used, effect is more pronounced on charcoal, heather grey, oatmeal
Ribbon drawstring tie at waist lets you cinch a line silhouette
Front pocket with openings and room for both hands
Avoid jewelry that may snag fabric
Avoid washing with items that may snag fabric during wash
Machine wash cold with like colors
Do Not Bleach, No tumble dry. Flat/line dry. No Iron, Steam ok.
87% polyester, 9% rayon, 4% spandex
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection

products.name: dining table
products.content:
Wash and Dry on delicate cycle with like colors, Hang or Flat Dry. Steam press, use press cloth to avoid damaging spandex
body: 95% rayon, 5% spandex
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection
*Model is 5' 11" wearing size small
the silhouette is slightly updated version of our Well Played lounge pant, with slightly more room in thighs and wider waistband.
